ARABIC: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى سَفَاهَةٍ وَإِنَّا لَنَظُنُّكَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The ruling circle of those of his people who were kafir said, 'We consider you a fool and think you are a liar.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The chiefs of his people who were infidels replied: "We find you full of folly, and a liar to boot."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The unbelievers among the leading men of his people said: 'Indeed we see you in folly, and consider you to be liars.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A group of the unbelievers among his people said, "You look to us like a fool and we think that you are a liar".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The disbelieving leaders of his people said, “Indeed we consider you foolish and think you are a liar.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: "Verily, we see you in foolishness, and verily, we think you are one of the liars."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The chiefs of those who disbelieved from among his people said: Most surely we see you in folly, and most surely we think you to be of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said the Council of the unbelievers of his people, 'We see thee in folly, and we think that thou art one of the liars.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The chieftains of his people, who were disbelieving, said: Lo! we surely see thee in foolishness, and lo! we deem thee of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The leading men of his people who refused to acknowledge the truth, said, "We can see you are a foolish man, and we think you are lying."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The chiefs of those who disbelived among his people said: verily we see thee in folly, and verily we deem thee to be of the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The elite of his people who were faithless said, ‘Indeed we see you to be in folly, and indeed we consider you to be a liar.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The leaders of the Unbelievers among his people said: "Ah! we see thou art an imbecile!" and "We think thou art a liar!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: "Verily, we see you in foolishness, and verily, we think you are one of the liars."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The disbelieving assembly of his nation said: 'We see you in foolishness, and think that you are of the liars'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The elite of his people who disbelieved said, “We see foolishness in you, and we think that you are a liar.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Said the eminent ones who disbelieved among his people, "Indeed, we see you in foolishness, and indeed, we think you are of the liars."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:66] The council, those of his people who disbelieved, said: ‘We truly see you in folly, ignorance, and we truly deem you of the liars’, in your Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The chieftains of his people, who were disbelieving, said: Lo! we surely see thee) Noah (in foolishness) in ignorance, (and lo! we deem thee of the liars) in what you say.
